mdq:check.name: Resource Publisher Identifier
mdq:check.description: Check that a resource publisher identifier exists.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status
import metadig.variable as mvar
# A resource publisher identifier is not present if 'resourcePublisherIdentifier' not in globals() or resourcePublisherIdentifier is None: output = "A resource publisher identifier was not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
if (mvar.isBlank(resourcePublisherIdentifier)): output = "The resource publisher identifier is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if resource publisher identifier is a single string or arrayList if(isinstance(resourcePublisherIdentifier, str) or isinstance(resourcePublisherIdentifier, unicode)): output = "The resource publisher identifier '{}' was found".format(resourcePublisherIdentifier) else: output = "The resource publisher identifier '{}' was found".format(resourcePublisherIdentifier[0]) status = "SUCCESS" return True
